casebody.data:
HARVEY W. PETERS, KEITH RAPSEY, DAVID V. UIHLEIN, I. ANDREW RADER AND VINCENT R. SHIELY, AS TRUSTEES OF THE MARGARET LOOCK TRUST; AND THE ALLEN-BRADLEY FOUNDATION, INC. v. THE UNITED STATES HARVEY W. PETERS, KEITH RAPSEY, DAVID V. UIHLEIN, I. ANDREW RADER AND VINCENT R. SHIELY, AS TRUSTEES OF THE CAROLINE D. BRADLEY LIFE TRUST; AND THE ALLEN-BRADLEY FOUNDATION, INC. v. THE UNITED STATES No. 426-77 No. 427-77

[224 Ct. Cl. 222,

624 F. 2d 1020]

On November 28, 1980 the court entered judgment for the plaintiff of $723,080.78, plus statutory interest, in No. 426-77 and the petition is dismissed in No. 427-77.
